trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Belpre
There were no other sightings in Belpre on or around September 22nd 2007
Summary: marquise shaped flash blue/white in color
divs: Sighting Detailsheading south bound on oh-7 i heard a fluttering sound over the sound of my stereo looked up in direction of sound saw an elongated marquise shaped flash which was moving NE toward vienna wv. saw second flash looked like it was over the wv side and it reflected on the river. after seeing this the car behind me pulled over and stopped. i felt disoriented and continued home. when i got home my girlfriend noticed the upper part of my cheeks and my nose looked sun burnt. i still feel disoriented... i called a friend and asked them if they heard any wierd sounds today and they described the sound exactly and in same time frame...
